channel.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
channel.description:
Ask here for tips and tricks about this chapter. Tell where you're stuck and others will give the solutions.
[i](Please keep always on topic. Don't post about other chapters or create random chit-chat here)[/i]

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
REDPyro:

The scientists aren’t talking, the ones right in front of the room with the sawblades.

Does AI Disabled show up on your screen, it could mean your saved game is corrupt. You might want to restart the chapter from the New Game menu.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Carnaxus
item.description:
So I’m in the airlock room (reminds me of Black Mesa East’s airlocks ) and the “lead” scientist has asked me to “take a look.” What the heck does he want me to do?! I went up and looked at the security cameras, I ran all up and down the hallway…halp!

Edit:

Turns out Mr. Scientist was stuck. Reloaded from the autosave in the crematory and it worked fine.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: adrianfox
item.description:
I’ve played through QE a few times and it seems quite a short (but very good) chapter.

Just played it again today (30/9/13) and again it’s a very good chapter but does seem short. In the ambush room there’s a second floor. It would be nice to somehow access that floor.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
If it happened at the first map of surface tension, it’s a known bug.

Fix
Open the console and type:
give weapon_tau

Did you check if you had any tau ammos left?

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: nhnifong
item.description:
Hi there, I just joined because I lost my new gun. I got the gun with the orange laser (tau cannon?) and I took a few shots with it and then I got into a little fight and lost it. I thought maybe I dropped it but it doesn’t seem to be on the floor. Can someone help me get it back?

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: MatthewCollin
item.description:
I’m having a problem in this chapter. I kill all of the soldiers, the scientists come in and blab near the door, then just stand there. They won’t let me out.

This has got to be a bug right? I didn’t have this problem the first time I played through the game. Is there a way to manually load the next map?

EDIT: Nevermind, I just started a new game at Surface Tension and went on from there. I forgot you could do that.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: mattlach
item.description:
SilverlightPony:

Did you kill the two shooting down from the edge of the skylight?

Once all the soldiers are dead, the scientists should enter the lobby and gather near the front door, talk for a bit, then let you out.

Yep. I got the guys on the roof.

Just tried it again. No success

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: SilverlightPony
item.description:
mattlach:

I’ve replayed the battle with the solidiers many many times now on the hardest difficulty level.

I won 4 of these times, but every time I’m stuck here afterwards. I’ve looked around for soldiers I may have missed, thrown grenades upstairs just in case there were some up there hiding, nothing I can do will get me past the lobby. It’s just me and a bunch of dead soldiers.

Help please???

Did you kill the two shooting down from the edge of the skylight?

Once all the soldiers are dead, the scientists should enter the lobby and gather near the front door, talk for a bit, then let you out.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: EvilGoodGuy
item.description:
bigfan421:

anyone got any tips for taking out the soldiers in the Lobby after rescuing the scientists?
I’ve gotten killed by the marines in this section so many times, I’m considering turning on the console and enabling God Mode.

Shoot the first few that rappel down, then immediately shoot the ones that are on the roof shooting down at you.

Then basically just hide behind the metal crates near the back and wait for them to approach you. Some of them drop medkits, so make sure to look out for them.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
Crossbow is your best friend. Stay at the bottom of the stairs where you enter the room. Turn it into your personal little foxhole. That way you cannot ever get flanked from behind, and the stairs provide excellent cover and concealment.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: Z3R0B4NG
item.description:
Conti:

You have to turn on all lasers in optronics center to activate the main “laser cannon” (the one with two headcrabs as targets). When the cannon is ready, disconnect the plug at the right side of the headcrabs and fire the laser.

The laser will make a hole in the wall and you’ll be able to pass through, falling in the cremators area. The scientists room is in front of the cremators.

and that is where i am stuck

did exactly that, but got no hole in the wall,
after running around for 10 minutes and getting the guard from last loadscreen killed (did not find any scientists to open any doors either…?) i returned to the console and it was invisible! (textures gone!?)
(just the glows of the buttons were still there and they were still interactable)
also i have found no scientists alive anywhere, no idea what doors you guys are talking about here…

just the glows of the buttons were still there and interactable… saved / loaded / loaded previous auto save but the console stays invisible, i guess i’ll have to load a save from far earlier now (where all the green trickjump pots were ugh)

//edit:
and as always 10 seconds after this post i found my error…
i did disconnect the power plug AFTER i pressed the fire button, you have to remove the plug BEFORE you press the power button, for some reason i thought the lights stay red if you try that

anyway here is a screenshot of the invisible console: https://img6.imagebanana.com/img/sn0mv9vw/hl22012092110265636.png
not sure what happened there, it was visible at first but then this all of a sudden.

anyway moving on now.

Read full topic

item.title: QUESTIONABLE ETHICS - Stuck here?
item.dc:creator: idclip
item.description:
stormseeker:

They have some samples in there brought back from the borderworld, and use it to test potential chemical (In this case Cyanogen Chloride - yes I know its clear in reality, but invisible looks bad.

They might have put a colorant in the gas so they know that the room X has been filled by gas and needs to be cleaned before enter!

Also, I came to say that even though this is not a request for help, the last fight is very tough, even on medium. with 100/83 took me almost 10 tries to beat it, and at that point I had learnt every spawn spot, and I was firing as they were spawning. Talks someone who plays on the hardest difficulties usually (I’m talking about fps), so I see why someone had to complain about the marines.

Read full topic
